stages.title: Requirements Gathering
stages.description: Detailed study of requirements, resources and source information on the project and formation of technical specifications for software development.

stages.title: UX/UI Design
stages.description: Development of modern functional and user-friendly design using the latest tools.

stages.title: Prototype (MVP)
stages.description: As a result of the design, a prototype is formed and sent for product development.

stages.title: Development
stages.description: The process of developing an intelligent accounting system, mobile application or website in maximum transparency mode.

stages.title: Testing
stages.description: During test runs, we ensure complete fault tolerance of the product.

stages.title: Deployment
stages.description: Launching the finished product into operation (ISU, website, application).

stages.title: Support and Maintenance
stages.description: We provide full technical support and maintenance on all issues arising after deployment.
